title: Sent Money to Wrong Email to Recover Account
body:
Hi my friend bought me RP and he chargeback the payments. he bought 35$ of it. i sent 35$ to

CHARGEBACKPAYMENTS-NA@RIOTGAMES.COM

instead of

CHARGEBACKPAYMENTS-US@RIOTGAMES.COM

What do i do now?

replies.body:
I'd recommend contacting paypal to have the payment reversed, then send the chargeback payment to the proper address.
If you still need help, just reach out to us in the Riot Support request you have open. :)
